name: Penguin Lord's Greed and Generosity
description:
Penguin Lord's Greed and Generosity Supporting Language: Chinese & English

Today, I, The Emperor of Penguins, will give you the legal rights to be the Duke of Yelswork Land. From this moment on, you are the Lord of this place! This caused many Dukes to stare at your power. Be sure to act carefully, or your status will be lost at any time. 

At the same time, your penguins will keep telling you about their difficulties and demand for quacks. Remember, your prudence will make the country better, and your kindness will make the penguins happier. Therefore, you will need to use your wisdom and judgment. 

In addition, what is more serious is the threat of other national powers and the black water coming from the north! You need to satisfy the penguins while developing your castle to help you to face threats from all sides. 

Unfortunately, your penguins are all ignorant...It's wise to keep the right amount of quacks in your administration to save both the penguins and the country. Be sure to put your money and vision to good use. Have a nice day.

企鵝領主的貪婪與慷慨支援語言:中文&英文

簡介: 今天，我將賦予你為管理耶爾斯域嶺的合法公爵。從這一刻開始，你就是這個地方的領主了!

這惹來不少公爵對你的權力虎視眈眈，務必小心行事，否則你的地位隨時不保。同時，你的鵝民會不斷前來苛索，所以你的工作就是把呱適當的分配給他們，協助他們解決問題。

謹記，你的謹慎會使國家發展得更好，而你的仁慈會使鵝民更加快樂。因此，需要用到你的智慧和判斷。更嚴重的是其他國家勢力的威脅和北方黑水都正蔓延到你的國家!你需要在滿足鵝民的同時發展你的城堡，以面對各方面的威脅。

不過鵝民都是愚昧的…行政時保留適量的呱來拯救鵝民和國家是明智之舉，務必好好利用你的資金和遠見。 祝你有美好的一天。
